comment: Honestly the worst professors i have EVER taken. Very strict on syllabus and shows zero support and compassion for students. for a summer course there was a massive workload and she didn't even let me complete all the assignments for the time i wasn't even registered for the class. register for this class if you enjoy stiff crassness.

Grade was based on three tests based on the textbook not the lectures, a large group project, and online mcgraw hill assignments. Lots of mcgraw assignments but they help you on the test. The lectures/guest speakers didn't teach you the test, but furthered your understanding. Group project was to create a campaign for social good. Loved the class!

I took her mktg3150.Her classes don't teach you what are going to be on the test but everyone in my class is doing really well right now.There is a guest speaker almost every day but they actually helped me realize what I want to do with my degree.Tests-lockdown browser online,hella McGraw assignments don't procrastinate,lengthy group project

SHE IS ABSOLUTELY AWFUL! Discussions board posts though packback. Posts have to have citations, 5 REPLIES ON EVERY POST!! Some weeks have two. Quizzes have nothing to do with chapter reading and they have lockdown and camera requirements. Semester long group project that she gives minimal guidance on. I will be reporting to the department chair.

WORST PROFESSOR EVER!!! It was obvious she pawned the course off to AI. Syllabus, rubrics, grading and group project were all done through AI. She didn't pay attention to the course. Multiple weeks where assignments weren't open on time. THERES A REASON 0% would retake her. I wish I had more than 350 characters here because I could go on all day.

WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT TAKE LAURA BOMAN!! She is easily the worst professor I have ever had at Kennesaw. Her lectures aren't even helpful for tests or quizzes, One morning she legit brought her kid in and made us listen to him talk abt dinosaurs she then quizzed us to see if we were paying attention...Save urself the mental agony & don't take her.

Take this professor if you want to spend all of your time next semester on a class that probably does not even relate to your major. If your major is marketing, she will make you want to change it. Please take care of your mental and physical well-being by avoiding this professor.
RUN FAR AWAY.
one of the worst professors I have ever taken at this school. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PROFESSOR IF YOU CAN AVOID HER!!

When the syllabus starts with "ignore the D2L schedule" you know that you're in for a treat. For a summer class, the amount of work borderline exceeds that of a fall/spring course. Homework, papers, discussions, not exaggerating, due every night. Even with that, you're still going to fall behind. Run from this woman and her abysmal art of teaching.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Lecture heavy

comment: you should take her if you want to learn absolutely nothing. 20 Quizzes-3 dropped, 3 tests, a final, and a semester-long group project. Her lectures are useless when it comes to the tests and quizzes, the powerpoints she posts online don't even cover all of the information, so you have to read the textbook. she has no clue what she's talking about
Beware do not take this professor, I would even take the class a different semester if you can't find an opening besides her intro to marketing class.
Worst professor EVER she barely know anything about marketing. She reads off the screen and does not review for our exams. Never again will I take her!!!

20 chapter quizzes,3 dropped, no webcam 3 exams (in person, cheat sheet),1 final (cumulative and online with lockdown/webcam),group project ,in class assignments. Class avg for exam was a failing grade. Tests are written by who writes the textbook and are extremely hard. It is possible to pass this class but it is ridiculously hard for no reason.

Worst professor you could ever take for Marketing. This lady will make your life miserable for 15 weeks. She does not care about her job -- she would rather have guest speakers (including her own 7-year old son) give lectures than teach herself. Her exam questions are nothing like the PowerPoints she (barely) goes over in class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Hands down the WORSE professor at KSU I have no clue how she was even hired. She can't teach, she shows videos, has multiple guest speakers. The Exams are BS they don't make any sense and the average is always 66% this is an intro class it shouldn't be this hard. 0/10 do not take the professor.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Absolute worst teacher, more concerned with guest speakers than teaching anything. Content isn't that difficult but she will not teach you a single thing. not worth the headache

CLICK OFF THIS PROFESSOR. 

Her child came in and yapped about dinosaurs for 20 minutes.. (and we took a quiz on it)

The class average was below 66%. We had useless in-class activities with guest speakers who didn't even teach us stuff that would be on the exam. 

I wouldn't wish this class on my enemies. Matter fact I'd help them leave.

It is an INTRODUCTION to marketing class, and the class average for the last test was 66%. She gives pointless in-class activities when she could just as easily take attendance. If you want to reach out to her, she will give you a passive-aggressive response, essentially blaming YOU for not knowing the information she failed to teach.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: AVOID AT ALL COSTS. So bad the class considered mutiny. Class test average is a 66%. No review for exams, the answer keys for practice were WRONG. Absolutely no self-awareness. If your entire class is failing maybe YOURE the problem. In class activities are beyond useless (her kid son gave us a test on dinosaurs). DO NOT TAKE EVER.

The lectures do not match the tests or quizzes at all. She reads the power points word for word. For the study guide she provided, some of her answers were wrong on the answer key. Do not take this professor. Her office hours barley help at all.

The professor barely goes over 10% of the slides for the chapter before the quizzes. The tests are extremely hard and the professor does nothing to help students prepare for them. Avoid this professor at all costs! Professor invites random guest speakers and makes students do useless in-class activities instead of teaching.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment:
i've had a lot of bad professors in the past. 

This is the worst, avoid at all costs for your sanity.

she just reads the textbook and randomly gives in class assignments for a grade. her tests are from a question bank and you have to really study. she lets you have a cheat sheet on the test but there's barley enough time to take the lockdown test in class. one time she couldn't figure out how to make the test active so we lost 20 mins on the test.
